txt.en: 'So, you may have noticed that Wargs do not exactly make the best behaved mounts. Well, it takes a powerful goblin to keep them cowed enough to train and ride them.\n\n'That is where the Master of Beasts comes in. If you kill him, the rest of the goblins will have a difficult time keeping their mounts in line.'
'Warg-riders may be the strongest among goblins, but their mounts are hard to control. With the Master of Beasts gone, this band will have a difficult time mounting up for a while.'
'Have you dealt with the Master of Beasts yet?'

The goblin known as the Master of Beasts trains the Isen Wargs so that the goblins may ride them into battle. His defeat would mean a considerable setback to the riders as they struggle to tame their vicious mounts.
The Master of Beasts resides in the caves of western Nan Curunír.\n\nOndor instructed you to defeat the Master of Beasts.
Talk to Ondor in Nan Curunír
Ondor is encamped near the caves of western Nan Curunír.\n\nYou should tell Ondor that you have defeated the Master of Beasts.
